entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending near noon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 near Haro Strait this afternoon. High 11. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 near Haro Strait this evening and after midnight. Wind becoming light after midnight. Low 8. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. High 11. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 70 percent chance of showers in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 except west 40 gusting to 60 near Juan de Fuca Strait. High 11. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Thursday 6 April 2023
